item.title: A few word
item.description: Writing is your weakness since you re. You’re never good at expressing your idea. Make it useful.

item.title: New Year Plan 2018
item.description: Say hi,say bye! Say goodbye to yesterday low-efficiency and embrace a brand-new, productive lifestyle. Cliche as always. I don’t recall how much blogs I have created before.But I’m sure this blog will last as long as I’m able to write. Consider this article as the debut of ‘I do’ new episode, as well as the end of ‘Hello World’ storyline. Criteria Forget about yourself, don’t critize and judge your past.
